# WIIFM Alignment exports

- `src/departments/service/training/wiifm-alignment/WIIFMAlignment.jsx`

- `service_ui-wiifm-alignment_primary_v1_1920w.png`
- `service_ui-wiifm-alignment_primary_v1.svg`
